amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Environmental Justice Program within the EPA Environmental Programs and Management account by $1,011,000 and decrease funding for the Leadership and Administration within the DOI Office of the Secretary by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 115-297 to restore funding for the Environmental Justice Program within the EPA Environmental Programs and Management account with an equivalent cut to Leadership and Administration within the DOI Office of the Secretary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A067) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 218 (Roll no. 473).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A067) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 218 (Roll no. 473).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A067) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
